手いっぱい: (ていっぱい) - having one's hands full; not having any room to do more; at the limit
手おくれ: (ておくれ) - being (too) late; belated treatment
手おの: (ておの) - (esp. ておの) hatchet; (esp. ちょうな) adze/adz
手がかかる: (てがかかる) - to take a lot of dealing with; to be a handful
手がける: (てがける) - to handle/to manage/to deal with/to work with/to have experience with; to rear/to look after
手がすべる: (てがすべる) - to have one's hands slip (and drop something)
手がつけられない: (てがつけられない) - out of control; out of hand; unmanageable
手がない: (てがない) - not having enough workers/being understaffed/being undermanned; having nothing one can do about something/having no options
手が上がる: (てがあがる) - to improve one's skill (esp. at calligraphy or drinking larger amounts of alcohol)
手が付けられない: (てがつけられない) - out of control; out of hand; unmanageable
手が出ない: (てがでない) - out of one's reach; beyond one's grasp
手が出る: (てがでる) - to jab/to swing at a bad ball (baseball); to reach for (a snack, etc.)
手が切れる: (てがきれる) - to break off with (e.g. one's lover); to be sharp enough to cut one's skin (of a new banknote, etc.)
手が利く: (てがきく) - to be able; to be competent
手が塞がる: (てがふさがる) - (ant: 手が空く) to be busy; to be tied up doing something
手が届く: (てがとどく) - to be able to reach/to be within one's reach/to be able to afford/to have the means to buy; to be near (a certain age)
手が後ろに回る: (てがうしろにまわる) - to have one's hands tied behind one; to be arrested
手が悪い: (てがわるい) - being dealt a bad hand (in mahjong, card games, etc.); poor (handwriting); unscrupulous
手が掛かる: (てがかかる) - to take a lot of dealing with; to be a handful
手が早い: (てがはやい) - to be a quick worker; to be fast in forming relationships with women; to be quick to resort to violence
手が混む: (てがこむ) - to be intricate; to be elaborate; to be complicated; to be complex
手が滑る: (てがすべる) - to have one's hands slip (and drop something)
手が無い: (てがない) - not having enough workers/being understaffed/being undermanned; having nothing one can do about something/having no options
手が空く: (てがすく) - (ant: 手が塞がる) to be free; to be available
手が足りない: (てがたりない) - short of hands
手が込む: (てがこむ) - to be intricate; to be elaborate; to be complicated; to be complex
手が離せない: (てがはなせない) - having to continue doing the work at hand; right in the middle of something
手が離れる: (てがはなれる) - to become independent; to leave one's hands/to leave one's possession
手ぐし: (てぐし) - using one's fingers as a comb; combing one's hand through one's hair
手ぐすねひく: (てぐすねひく) - (from 手に薬煉を引く)  to be ready and waiting for; to be on the alert for
手ぐすね引く: (てぐすねひく) - (from 手に薬煉を引く)  to be ready and waiting for; to be on the alert for
手こずる: (てこずる) - to have much trouble; to have a hard time; to not know how to handle
手ごたえ: (てごたえ) - response; resistance; reaction; feedback
手ごわい: (てごわい) - difficult; tough; formidable; redoubtable; stubborn
手じまい: (てじまい) - clearing of accounts; evening of accounts; liquidation
手ずから: (てずから) - in person; personally; (do) oneself
手ずれ: (てずれ) - becoming worn or soiled with handling; being old-fashioned
手ずれる: (てずれる) - to have become worn; to be used to the ways of the world
手っ取り早い: (てっとりばやい) - quick/prompt/without delay; simple/easy/effortless
手っ取り早く言えば: (てっとりばやくいえば) - in a word; to put it briefly; to make a long story short
手っ甲: (てっこう) - covering for the back of the hand and wrist
手つき: (てつき) - manner of using one's hands
手つだう: (てつだう) - to help/to assist/to aid; to contribute to/to be a factor in
手づかみ: (てづかみ) - grasping (with one's bare hands); holding; grabbing; seizing; catching
手づくり: (てづくり) - handmade; homegrown; hand-crafted; homemade
手づよい: (てづよい) - strong; resolute; firm; strict
手なし: (てなし) - handless/armless; {bot} vineless plant; sleeveless undergarment/sleeveless haori; menstruation/period
手なずける: (てなずける) - to tame; to win over
手なづける: (てなづける) - to tame; to win over
手にかかる: (てにかかる) - to fall into someone's hands; to place oneself in someone's power
手にかける: (てにかける) - to take care of/to bring up under one's personal care; to kill with one's own hands; to do personally/to handle (e.g. a job); to request that someone deal with (something)
手にする: (てにする) - to hold (in one's hand)/to take (into one's hand); to own/to obtain
手につかない: (てにつかない) - to not be able to concentrate on (due to distractions, etc.)
手にはいる: (てにはいる) - to obtain; to come into possession of; to get hold of; to get one's hands on
手に乗る: (てにのる) - to be fooled by something; to be taken in
手に付かない: (てにつかない) - to not be able to concentrate on (due to distractions, etc.)
手に余る: (てにあまる) - to be beyond one's capacities; to be beyond one's powers; to be beyond one's control; to be unmanageable
手に入る: (てにはいる) - to obtain; to come into possession of; to get hold of; to get one's hands on
手に入れる: (てにいれる) - to obtain; to procure
手に取る: (てにとる) - to take in one's hand; to pick up
手に取るように: (てにとるように) - quite clearly; quite distinctly; perfectly; exactly
手に掛かる: (てにかかる) - to fall into someone's hands; to place oneself in someone's power
手に掛ける: (てにかける) - to take care of/to bring up under one's personal care; to kill with one's own hands; to do personally/to handle (e.g. a job); to request that someone deal with (something)
手に汗を握る: (てにあせをにぎる) - to sit on the edge of one's seat; to be in breathless suspense
手に着かない: (てにつかない) - to not be able to concentrate on (due to distractions, etc.)
手に職をつける: (てにしょくをつける) - to acquire a trade; to learn a vocation
手に職をもつ: (てにしょくをもつ) - to have a trade; to have a vocation
手に職を就ける: (てにしょくをつける) - to acquire a trade; to learn a vocation
手に職を持つ: (てにしょくをもつ) - to have a trade; to have a vocation
手に職を着ける: (てにしょくをつける) - to acquire a trade; to learn a vocation
手に落ちる: (てにおちる) - to fall into (someone's) hands; to fall under someone's control; to become someone's property (e.g. of an object)
手に負えない: (てにおえない) - spoiled; unmanageable; uncontrollable; incorrigible; obstreperous
手のかかる: (てのかかる) - troublesome; difficult (e.g. customer, guest, child); laborious (e.g. task, dinner)
手のひらを返す: (てのひらをかえす) - to change one's attitude quickly; (たなごころをかえす is often used figuratively as an example of something easy) to flip over one's hand
手の内: (てのうち) - palm (of one's hand); skill; scope of one's power; one's intentions/one's plan; one's hand (mahjong, card games, etc.)
手の内を見せる: (てのうちをみせる) - to reveal one's true intentions; to show one's cards
